playerMoveStudentToIsland(String, int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.game_controller.GameController
Given the player name which made the move, the index of the student of his entrance he wants to move and the island index, it moves the selected student to the selected island if it's the player's turn, otherwise it sends a NOT_YOUR_TURN error message.
